full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LIG DANG CHU BO DKAR PO DANG RI BO 'PHAN DAR DKAR PO SOGS KYI BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI LIG DANG CHU BO DKAR PO DANG RI BO 'PHAN DAR DKAR PO SOGS KYI, BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES DANG STOBS @003B PHUN SUM TSOGS PA DANG LDAN PA'I ZHING MKHAN SDE BA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, LCAGS PHO SPREL LO'I ZLA BA BDUN PA TSESS BZANG POR BSTAN PA BLA MTSO'I 'GRAM DU ^MKHAN CHEN SPRUL MING BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN BSTAN PA TSUL KHRIMS DPAL BZANG POS SBYAR BA'O, ,YI GE PA NI GZIMS DPON DGE SLONG RIN CHEN GYIS BRIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN 'GRO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN BSTAN PA TSUL KHRIMS,
